title: JSON to File
description: In this lab, we will delve into JavaScript programming by exploring the fundamentals of the language. The lab focuses on building a strong foundation in JavaScript programming concepts, including data types, functions, loops, and conditional statements. By the end of the lab, you will have gained the skills necessary to build simple JavaScript programs and have a solid understanding of the language's syntax and structure.

verify.name: Open the Terminal/SSH and type 'node'
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
